title: ollama/ollama
summary: Ollama’s official CLI and server that lets you pull, create, and run Llama-2, Mistral, Gemma, and other GGUF models locally with one command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for the Ollama API—chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from any Python script.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python SDK.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package that wraps Ollama’s chat & generate endpoints as standard LangChain LLMs and embedders.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model manager, multi-user, dark mode, mobile-ready).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with fluent builder API, streaming, and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, delete, and copy models from Ruby/Rails apps.

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Community Go CLI that wraps Ollama REST endpoints with prompts, templates, and batch scripting helpers.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacements for inline suggestions and chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset—use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community recipes: PDF chat, voice bots, function calling, fine-tuning, Docker Compose stacks, etc.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker image with CUDA and CPU variants plus docker-compose examples for GPU passthrough.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU node selectors and PVC support.

title: ollama-ui (streamlit)
summary: Minimal Streamlit chat UI that talks to Ollama REST API; good for quick internal demos.

title: ollama-rag
summary: End-to-end RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain to chat with local PDFs.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama responses into Discord threads with slash commands and model picker.

title: ollama-nix
summary: Nix flake to build and run Ollama with CUDA or ROCm and declarative model lists on NixOS.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that adds a local AI assistant pane powered by Ollama for note Q&A and summarization.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing async wrappers over Ollama REST endpoints with serde types.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Bolt-js Slack bot that streams Ollama answers in threads and supports per-channel model defaults.
